definition: vulcanization (curing rubber using sulfur and heat)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Objective: To study the damage effect of inhalation carbon disulfide on immunological cells of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨二硫化碳染毒对小鼠心肌细胞凋亡的影响。

sentences.english: Under sulfate reduction condition, aniline degradation was incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 反硫化条件下，苯胺降解不完全。

sentences.english: The calcines of siliceous zinc sulfide concentrates were treated hydrometallurgically.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高硅硫化锌精矿焙烧料的湿法处理。

sentences.english: A yellowish-brown nickel iron sulfide that is the principal ore of nickel.
sentences.chinese: 一种黄色矿物，含硫化镍，是少量镍的来源。

sentences.english: In vulcanization, a series of cross-links are introduced into an elastomer to give it strength.
sentences.chinese: 在硫化，一系列的交叉环节引入弹性体给它的实力。

sentences.english: In this method the interference come from inorganic sulfide was removed by Copper acetate homogenous precipitation met…
sentences.chinese: 水中无机硫化物的干扰用乙酸铜均匀沉淀法去除。

sentences.english: Applicable to all kinds of steel-plastic tube dip coating or curing.
sentences.chinese: 适用于各种钢塑管的喷涂或硫化浸塑。

sentences.english: H2S has a distinctive offensive smell, similar to "rotten eggs".
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢有一种令人讨厌的臭鸡蛋气味。

sentences.english: They would have been belching hydrogen sulfide and other gases.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以喷出硫化氢和其它的气体。

sentences.english: The latter one formed as sulfides and gossan.
sentences.chinese: 后者系岩体与地层接触，形成硫化物或铁帽。

sentences.english: Unlike sodium-sulfur batteries, vanadium-flow batteries don’t need to be heated to high temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 与硫化钠不同的是，液化钒电池不需要加热到高温。

sentences.english: A mixture of a metal with its sulfides, produced by smelting the sulfide ores of copper, lead, or nickel.
sentences.chinese: 锍，冰铜一种带有硫化物的金属混合物，由熔炼。

sentences.english: Familiar with maintenance of compound extruder and autoclave equipment.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉橡胶挤出机，硫化设备维护。

sentences.english: Shaker concentrate containing a large number of sulfide ore, floating sulfur before floating scheelite.
sentences.chinese: 摇床精矿含有大量的硫化矿，浮白钨之前先浮硫。

sentences.english: Objective To study the damage effect of inhalation carbon disulfide on germ cells of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察二硫化碳吸入对小鼠生殖细胞的损伤。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
